channel.title: CVE Feed for Gophish -- Admin Panel
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Gophish -- Admin Panel

item.title: CVE-2024-2211|2024-03-06T10:47:03.845Z -- Gophish -- Admin Panel
item.description: Cross-Site Scripting stored vulnerability in Gophish affecting version 0.12.1. This vulnerability could allow an attacker to store a malicious JavaScript payload in the campaign menu and trigger the payload when the campaign is removed from the menu.
